resources.string: To access your Amazon account, you must first authorize your phone. A network connection is required to do this.
Enter your Amazon ID and enter your Amazon password.
Set up an unlocking gesture to authorize purchases.
To make purchases or set changes to tour account from your phone, you must identify yourself first.
Unlock your phone by using images and avoid the hassle of passwords.
Your phone is now authorized to your amazon account and all of you Amazon apps can now be used.
Scan the QR code to continue the authorization process.
This is the first test app
This is the second test app.
